fields.fieldText:

Or if you wish, you may contact support

fields.name: Primary_Industry
fields.fieldText: Primary Industry (We can add more later)
fields.helpText: Please add the primary industry. If you sell in multiple, that is okay, you can pick the primary, or select all

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR (8 AND 9) OR (8 AND 10)

fields.name: headerText_0
fields.fieldText: It looks like you already registered but your account was deactivated. If you feel this was in error, please contact support for assistance.
